tool.name: Cluster 3D
tool.command: cluster_3d -i '$infile' -if sdf --meta -o outp -of tsv &>> $logfile && cat outp_metrics.txt &>> $logfile && gzip -d outp.tsv.gz
tool.help:
.. class:: infomark
**What this tool does**
This tool performs 3D clustering for a set of input molecules, using the chemistry toolkit RDKit, and returns results in SDF format.
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Input**
| - Molecules in `SDF format`_
.. _SDF format: http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Chemical_table_file
-----
.. class:: infomark
**Output**
SD file containing clusters.
